name: Infinity Clicker (Attachment Studios)
description:
Download Instruction(LOVE):

  1. Download Love2D Engine For Your Device. You Can Get It From Love2D Official Website.
  2. Extract Zip File.
  3. Open The Destination Folder Of Zip File Where A File Named "Infinity Clicker v1.4" With The Extension Is ".love" Is Present.
  4. Open That File Using Love2D Engine.
  5. Now You Can Play It.
  6. For More Information About Data Just Unzip Data Files, Then Reach Information Folder.

Download Instruction(Windows 32-Bit):

  1. Extract Zip File
  2. Extract Infinity Clicker Windows Zip File
  3. Open Extraction Folder
  4. Copy Game, For Details, It Has Icon
  5. Paste Shortcut Where You Want The Game To Be
  6. Open Game

How To Play:

  • Just Click Anywhere Inside The Window.
  • Increase Score.
  • You Can Enable Beta By Pressing F2 Key. To Lock Beta View, While Pressing F2, Use Left Shift. To Unlock, Use Right Shift.

Credits:

  • Attachment-45 Productions
  • Attachment Studios

Note:

  • This Game Is Still In Development.
  • This Game Can Crash.
  • In Case Crash, Report Us Briefing What Happened At Itch Comments Or Our Official Attachment Studios Website.
